articles.title: Monde Nissin says Lucky Me! noodles safe to eat despite Europe warnings - Rappler
articles.description: Monde Nissin says ethylene oxide is not added to its products but is used to prevent microbial growth in spices. After processing, traces of the substance may still show.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines Monde Nissin on Thursday, July 7, said its popular instant noodle brand Lucky Me! is safe to consume despite health warnings and a recall order in some European countries.
